entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New-Wes-Valley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:18 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pool's Island 11:30 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -12.0°C
Wind: WNW 31 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 13 except minus 8 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 13 except minus 8 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
